attacks.name: First Impression
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Armor Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crossing Cut-GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
